```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
```

It is possible to include a interactive map using `{leaflet}`.

```{r station}
d.stations <- data.frame(Latitude = c(46.94809, 47.05048, 47.69732), 
                         Longitude = c(7.44744, 8.30635, 8.63493), 
                         Label = c("Bern", "Luzern", "Schaffhausen"))



leaflet(d.stations) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng = ~Longitude, lat = ~Latitude,
             label = d.stations$Label,
             labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = TRUE))
```
